question: Pour que le chef de chantier ______ bien les instructions, il faut utiliser un talkie-walkie.
explanation: The phrase 'Pour que' requires the subjunctive mood. 'Entende' is the present subjunctive of 'entendre' (to hear). The adverb 'effectivement' (indeed, effectively) confirms the necessity of the tool.
